oMeta.description: Les Misrables is one of the best-known novels of the nineteenth century. Taking place in the years during and after the Napoleonic wars, it follows the lives of several characters, particularly the ex-convict Jean Valjean, who struggles for redemption. In this sweeping story, Hugo expounds upon history, architecture, religion, and politics. Harp...
oMeta.title: Les Miserables

searchInfo.textSnippet: In this sweeping story, Hugo expounds upon history, architecture, religion, and politics. Harp.
